#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re items = re.findall('var\s(lista[^\s]+)\s*=[^"]+"TV([^"]+)',page_data) links = [] for title,url in items: links.append((title,url.decode('hex'))) return links

getUrl #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): source=requests.get('[makelist.param1]', headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:58.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/58.0','Accept':'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8'}).text;link=re.findall('iframe.*?src="(.*?)"',source)[0] source=requests.get(link,headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:58.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/58.0','Referer':'http://cablegratis.tv/','Accept':'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8'}).text;return re.findall('source: "(.*?)"',source)[0]+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer='+link

<a\s*href="([^"]+)"\s*class="card"\s*title="([^"]+)">\s*<img\s*src="([^"]+) http://cablegratis.tv/
getUrl #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re, requests id = re.findall("id='([^']+)';", page_data)[0] eurl = 'https://player.limpi.tv/embed/U2FsdGVkX1%2FVBJ6ZdT3l%2FDef9VSzUI4%2BCI7EjYJ0FzY%3D/{}'.format(id) headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:14.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/14.0.1', 'Referer': 'http://cablegratis.tv/'} html = requests.get(eurl, headers=headers,verify=False).text strurl = re.findall('source: "([^"]+)', html)[0] return '{}|User-Agent={}&Referer=https://player.limpi.tv/'.format(strurl, headers['User-Agent'])
